type.name: Classified_select
type.description: A classified_select selects a thing that is classified.

entity.name: Classification
entity.description:
A classification is a relationship that is between:
set S;
object x,
that indicates object x is a member of set S.
The meaning of this entity is identical to:
the entity applied_classification_assignment defined in ISO 10303-214; and
the entity classification defined in ISO 15926-2.

explicit.name: classified
explicit.description: the object that is being classified as a member of the class identified be classifier attribute.

explicit.name: classifier
explicit.description: the class that has the object identified by the classified attribute as a member.
